# Q&A Category

**Purpose:** Technical questions and answers about the PhoenixPME protocol.

**Before posting:**
1. Search existing discussions
2. Check the [Technical FAQ](https://github.com/PhoenixPME/coreum-pme/blob/main/docs/TECHNICAL_FAQ.md)
3. Review relevant documentation

**Post format:**
```
## Question
[Clear, specific question]

## What I've tried/checked
- [ ] Searched discussions for similar questions
- [ ] Checked the Technical FAQ
- [ ] Reviewed [relevant doc](link)

## Additional context
[Any relevant code, error messages, or setup details]
```

**Response expectations:**
- 48-hour typical response time
- Answers should reference documentation
- Follow-up questions welcome
